languages.text: {n}Атилиус украдкой косится на Ирлиэт и вымученно улыбается.{/n} "Весьма, весьма выдающаяся особа... после сегодняшнего прискорбного события я начал испытывать особое уважение к ее талантам! Воистину, даже мутанты, узревшие свет Бога-Императора, могут верно служить его пастве!"

{n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"
languages.original_text: {n}Атилиус украдкой косится на Ирлиэт и вымученно улыбается.{/n} "Весьма, весьма выдающаяся особа... после сегодняшнего прискорбного события я начал испытывать особое уважение к ее талантам! Воистину, даже мутанты, узревшие свет Бога-Императора, могут верно служить его пастве!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

{n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

{n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

{n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

languages.text: {n}阿蒂利乌斯斜视着伊莉耶特，露出了紧张的笑容。{/n}“她是位非常、非常出色的人……在今天发生了这种令人遗憾的事件之后，我变得极为推崇她的才能！毋庸置疑，哪怕是变种人，只要见过了神皇的光辉，也一样能忠实地为祂的子民服务！”
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿蒂利乌斯斜视着伊莉耶特，露出了紧张的笑容。{/n}“她是位非常、非常出色的人……在今天发生了这种令人遗憾的事件之后，我变得极为推崇她的才能！毋庸置疑，哪怕是变种人，只要见过了神皇的光辉，也一样能忠实地为祂的子民服务！”

languages.text: {n}Atilius mira de reojo a Yrliet y muestra una sonrisa forzada.{/n} «Una persona muy, muy excepcional... Tras el evento tan lamentable de hoy, ¡estoy empezando a tener sus talentos en alta estima! ¡Es cierto que incluso los mutantes pueden servir fielmente al Dios Emperador tras ver su luz!».
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius mira de reojo a Yrliet y muestra una sonrisa forzada.{/n} «Una persona muy, muy excepcional... Tras el evento tan lamentable de hoy, ¡estoy empezando a tener sus talentos en alta estima! ¡Es cierto que incluso los mutantes pueden servir fielmente al Dios Emperador tras ver su luz!».

languages.text: {n}アティリウスはユリエットに疑いの眼差しを向け、引きつった笑顔を作る。{/n}「ごくごく、稀な例外となる個人…今日の残念な出来事を考えると、ユリエットの才能を手放すわけにはいかないと、実に高く評価し始めています。正に、変異体だとしても神帝陛下の光を見るならば、その信徒に忠実に奉仕することもあり得るでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アティリウスはユリエットに疑いの眼差しを向け、引きつった笑顔を作る。{/n}「ごくごく、稀な例外となる個人…今日の残念な出来事を考えると、ユリエットの才能を手放すわけにはいかないと、実に高く評価し始めています。正に、変異体だとしても神帝陛下の光を見るならば、その信徒に忠実に奉仕することもあり得るでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Atilius blickt Yrliet misstrauisch an und lächelt gequält.{/n} "Ein hochgradig außergewöhnliches Individuum ... und nach dem heutigen Vorfall entwickle ich ein besonderes Wohlwollen für ihre Talente! Wahrlich, selbst Mutanten, die das Licht des Gottimperators gesehen haben, können seiner Herde treu dienen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius blickt Yrliet misstrauisch an und lächelt gequält.{/n} "Ein hochgradig außergewöhnliches Individuum ... und nach dem heutigen Vorfall entwickle ich ein besonderes Wohlwollen für ihre Talente! Wahrlich, selbst Mutanten, die das Licht des Gottimperators gesehen haben, können seiner Herde treu dienen!"

languages.text: {n}Atilius lance un regard de côté à Yrliet et lui adresse un sourire forcé.{/n} « C'est une personne absolument exceptionnelle... et après le regrettable incident d'aujourd'hui, je commence à tenir ses talents en très haute estime ! Elle est la preuve que quiconque a vu la lumière de l'Empereur-Dieu peut servir fidèlement ses ouailles, même les mutants ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Atilius lance un regard de côté à Yrliet et lui adresse un sourire forcé.{/n} « C'est une personne absolument exceptionnelle... et après le regrettable incident d'aujourd'hui, je commence à tenir ses talents en très haute estime ! Elle est la preuve que quiconque a vu la lumière de l'Empereur-Dieu peut servir fidèlement ses ouailles, même les mutants ! »

languages.text: {n}Atilius, göz ucuyla Yrliet'e bakıyor ve gergin bir gülümseme takınıyor.{/n} "Fevkaladenin fevkinde istisnai bir şahıs. Yeteneklerini, bugünkü elim olaydan sonra bilhassa takdir etmeye başladım! Gerçekten Tanrı İmparator'un ışığına yönelen mutantlar, O'nun cemaatine sadakatle hizmet edebilir!"
languages.original_text: {n}Atilius looks askance at Yrliet and offers a strained smile.{/n} "A highly, highly exceptional individual... after today's regretful event, I am beginning to hold her talents in particular esteem! Verily, even mutants who have seen the light of the God-Emperor can faithfully serve his flock!"

Yeteneklerini, bugünkü elim olaydan sonra bilhassa takdir etmeye başladım! Gerçekten Tanrı İmparator'un ışığına yönelen mutantlar, O'nun cemaatine sadakatle hizmet edebilir!"
